name: Call Of Frontier Duty: Black Ops Survival(itch)
name_original: Call Of Frontier Duty: Black Ops Survival(itch)
description:
Call Of Frontier Duty: Black Ops Survival Shooting game is a Frontline Mission first-person sniper game. The desert city streets are full of criminals and terrorists. Fury commando you must guard the city desert frontier & shoot to eliminate the elite commando terrorists. The black ops strikes are destroying peace of city restore the peace of the city.

Ready to enter the frontier battlefield and the evil black ops terrorists attack. Be an elite commando striker, have the best sniper shooting skills & assault frontier survival skills. The army frontline defense provided you with a variety of advanced and powerful weapons like hand Gun, machine guns, Assault Rifle, Rocket Launcher, Cross Bow, Shot Gun & AK47. The equipment is for better survive on the frontline battlefield.

Get ready on call of frontier duty vs black ops survival shooting. Survive & shoot in this thrilling free FPS 3D frontline survival grand shooting game. This is a black ops counter mission strike of evil enemy’s assassination. That will let you experience & use battle survival & gun shooting skills in intense & eventful war environment.

Call Of Frontier Duty: Black Ops Survival Shooting Features:

• Real 3D graphics
• Large number of advanced sniper, assault rifles
• Variety of challenging survival missions
• Real desert battlefield environment
• Smart AI of enemy makes the game more interesting
• amazing music and sound effects
• Play anytime, anywhere
• The best Shooter FPS Game
• Frontier defense Day & Night missions
• Many black ops trained Enemies to kill
• Awesome Arabic Town and city sniper and assault shooting mission
• Hostage situation escaping
• Smart AI of energy to improve health bar.
• Enjoy awesomeness of Gun, Assault Rifle, Rocket Launcher, Cross Bow, Shot Gun, AK47.

Be the Frontline soldier in Call of Frontier Duty: Black Ops Survival Shooting.
The best army shooter game among sniper games and commando games of 2018. Be proud frontier commando of the country. Strike as military commando army soldier hero, who has to hold aim & target for perfect shot. Call of Frontier duty has ultimate sniper killer sniper special ops shooting missions.
